notify.targetDoesntExist: Could not find a player with that ID!
notify.notPolice: You are not a police officer!
notify.sentenced: You have been sent to community service for %s actions
notify.sentBack: You have been sent back to community service!
notify.finished: You have finished your community service, Behave!
notify.finishedTask: You have completed a task %s tasks remain.

input.playerId: Id of the player you wish to sentence
input.removeplayerId: Id of the player's sentence you want to remove
input.actions: Number of actions you wish to sentence the player for.
